comments.body: Is the order of the options important? I think it should be alphabetically or by priority - wait is not the 1st one in either cases, I reckon.

Well, the generated [documentation](http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/modules_by_category.html) sorts the parameters alphabetically and it doesn't matter how they are sorted in this yaml documention. We can use some sorting rule, but in the  result documentation it doesn't matter.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +25,29 @@    DOCUMENTATION = '''
options:
    wait:
        description:
            - "True if the module should wait for the entity to get into desired state."
